actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6002 of title 18 of the United States Code to provide transactional immunity for witnesses compelled to testify after refusal on the basis of the privilege against self-incrimination.

summary.text: Provides transactional immunity for witnesses compelled to testify after refusal on the basis of the privilege against self-incrimination. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 6002)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6002 of title 18 of the United States Code to provide transactional immunity for witnesses compelled to testify after refusal on the basis of the privilege against self-incrimination.
